thread.title: nvirmani
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by nvirmani

author: nvirmani
title: nvirmani
text: Molly Malone of Costa Rican Vacations provided a very professional and helpful service in planning our trip to Costa Rica, taking into consideration our preferences and interests. We, as a group of 6 people, had a wonderful time there. Tours as planned by Molly were interesting and enjoyable. Resort hotel stay was very good. She provided useful hints about travel in Costa Rica. All the details from arrival to departure were taken care by the Costa Rican Vacations company. We would highly recommend Costa Rican Vacations.
